  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:aspect:eri/10008</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>aspect:eri/10008</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Informacijski sistemi in rešitve</string>
            <string language="en">Information systems and solutions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationssysteme und Lösungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Systèmes et solutions d'information</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistemas e soluções de informação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistemi d'informazione e soluzioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συστήματα πληροφοριών και λύσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistemas y soluciones de información</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poglavje o informacijskih sistemi in rešitvah v sklopu e-gradiva za računalništvo in informatiko. Vsebina poglavja: informacijski sistem, razvoj IS, povezanost IS-jev.</string>
            <string language="en">Chapter about information systems and solutions, part of e-materials for computer science and informatics. Chapter contents: information system, developing IS, connecting IS.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">informacijski sistem</string>
            <string language="en">information system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">razvoj</string>
            <string language="en">development</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">delo</string>
            <string language="en">work</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitel über Informationssysteme und Lösungen, 
Teil Ematerialien für Informatik und Informatik. Kapitelinhalt:
Informationssystem, sich entwickelnd IST und schließt IST an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chapitre au sujet des systèmes et des solutions 
d'information, partie d'e-matériels pour l'informatique et 
informatique. Contenu de chapitre : le système 
d'information, se développant EST, se reliant EST.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capítulo sobre sistemas e soluções de 
informação, parte dos e-materiais para a informática de e 
informatics. Índices do capítulo: o sistema de 
informação, tornando-se É, conectando É.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capitolo circa i sistemi d'informazione e le 
soluzioni facente parte i e-materiali per informatica ed informatica. 
Soddisfare di capitolo: il sistema d'informazione, 
sviluppandosi È, collegando È.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεφάλαιο για τα συστήματα πληροφοριών και τις λύσεις, 
μέρος των ε-υλικών για την πληροφορική και την πληροφορική. 
Περιεχόμενο κεφαλαίου: το σύστημα πληροφοριών, να 
αναπτυχθεί ΕΙΝΑΙ, η σύνδεση ΕΙΝΑΙ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capítulo sobre sistemas y soluciones de 
información, parte de los e-materiales para la informática e 
informática. Contenido del capítulo: el sistema de 
información, convirtiéndose ES, conectando ES.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationssystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwicklung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système d'information</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">développement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">travail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema de informação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desenvolvimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trabalho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistema d'informazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sviluppo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύστημα πληροφοριών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανάπτυξη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εργασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sistema de información</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">desarrollo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">trabajo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
